column1: Little Goat Diner////Good breakfast spot. Been here two times now. First time got the little goat goes to China. Second time got the parathas burrito. The description said it had chili oil
column2: but I couldn't taste any spice or heat at all. Flavor wise was good
column3: but it could have used a kick. The cinnamon roll was warmed before so it was nice and gooey
column4: and their house blend coffee was very nice and earthy. While the food has never been outstanding
column5: we keep coming back because the service is phenomenal. Our waiter was super attentive even with a full breakfast crowd for the hawks game
column6: and gave us to-go coffees for our morning walk. Will keep coming back!
